project.title: pyRijndael
project.author: Jeffrey Clement
project.shortdescription: A pure python implementation of the AES encryption standard, Rijndael.
project.description:
This is a pure python implementation of the Rijndael encryption algorithm with a really easy to use interface. If you need easy secure encryption for your python software look no further. Being that this is written in Python beware that it is really quite slow for large data sets.
.*2003/09/03* - fixed bug for future Python versions (2.4+)
